entries.title: C++ Developer
details: Enhanced codebase reliability through targeted refactoring of problematic classes and interfaces, decreasing related Jira issues raised by QA by ∼40%
Extensively utilised debugging tools to pinpoint and resolve numerous game-breaking bugs, whilst working under tight release schedules
Leveraged the Python ecosystem to streamline data hand-over procedures, strengthening collaboration with other departments
Delivered substantially improved frame-rates on projects, using algorithm and cache optimisation, and fine-tuning of critical functions
Promoted company cohesion by facilitating events that aided newcomers in understanding the business's technology stack and operating processes

entries.title: Full-Stack Developer & CS/Maths Tutor
details: Employed responsive design principles and dynamic layouts using flexbox and grid, to revamp legacy UIs and vastly improve usability on mobile devices
Used my expertise with APIs, databases and containerization to aid in the planning and execution of a large monolith-to-microservices migration project
Applied deep understanding of the subject matter to deliver comprehensive tutoring for a range of ages and abilities, from KS3 to undergraduate level
Tailored sessions to cater to personal needs and preferences, employing a range of teaching methods, and evaluating them with student feedback
Guaranteed complete syllabus coverage ahead of crucial exam deadlines, through structured timetabling, and regular evaluation of students' progress

entries.title: Full-Stack React/ASP.NET Developer
details: Engaged in rapid iteration with the UI/UX team, promptly integrating client reviews to promote usability, develop priority features and resolve issues
Leveraged SQL optimization, indexing, and caching, to achieve 50% reduced query response times for several high-traffic client databases
Proposed and implemented dynamic documentation features for our products, clarifying their usage and functionality, to the benefit of clients and colleagues

entries.title: Full-Stack React/Node Developer
details: Developed a deep understanding of the company's operations to build a bespoke CRM system, cutting working hours by a third, whilst boosting profits
Features included: item lotting and payment tracking, customer database management,  receipt generation, weekly business reports and analytics

entries.title: BSc Computer Science
details: Thesis: Haskell Lambda-Cube Interpreter
(Functional Programming, Lambda Calculus, Type Theory)

entries.title: A Levels
details: Maths • Further Maths • Physics • Computing (AS)
A fully-fledged parser, and call-by-name evaluator, for Lambda Calculus
Uses a novel method to generate circuit-like diagrams that clarify the binding structure of lambda terms
